janatha wimukthi peramune sannaddha balakaya me bhishanaye piyawaru wuwa se ma eeta prathiwiruddhawa nagi siti rajya thrasthawadaya da bhishanayata wakra lesin dayaka wiya. 1988 desambar 19 dina, pawathwana lada janadhipathiwaranaye prathipalawala walangubhawayata abhiya lawa maha sabhawe bahuthara kamaththa paridi rahas chandayak ho prasiddha chandayak pawathwiya haki bawa pawasu athara eyata prathiwiruddhawa adahas dakwu triksi nanayakkara mahathmiya, apa piligatha yuththe dalpandu wyawasthawata wada krida panatha bawath ema nisa krida panathata anuwa prasi n. 2004 maha mathiwaranayedi ratei balawega dekak thibuna.
